EmailTemplate.name: *WORKFLOW Interview Prep Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Interview Prep
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Step Forward invites you to an Interview Preparation Event
Dear {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.Associate__c},
In Spring you are going to be invited to formal interviews with potential employers and we want to make sure you are a prepared for it as possible. The Interview Preparation Event will last 2 hours and during this time you will:
prepare for the formal interviews you’ll be having with employers in Spring develop interview techniques that will be useful beyond Step Forward get one step closer to starting your career journey with Step Forward in September
You are expected to attend this event as it will be invaluable for when you meet employers. Please confirm your attendance here before Sunday 15th March.
Date
Saturday 21st March
Time
9.30am for a 10am start
Dress Code
Please dress as you would for a job interview. If you are unsure what to wear, dress as you would for something formal taking place at your college.
Venue
St Luke’s Community Centre
90 Central Street
London
EC1V 8AJ
[MAP]
We look forward to seeing you there.
Step Forward
